code: import{CartActionTypes}from"./cart.types";export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:CartActionTypes.TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clearItem=function clearItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.CLEAR_ITEM,payload:item};};
